name: GPT-trainer
author: GPT-trainer

sections.description:
GPT-Trainer empowers you to build a ChatGPT-like AI chat portal using your own data. No-code. Embed your AI chatbot directly onto your WordPress website using this plugin.

For chatbot training and setup, please visit our official website: GPT-trainer. Thank you for your support!

This plugin utilizes GPT-trainer services to deploy a pre-trained chatbot on your website, leveraging the data you’ve uploaded to the GPT-trainer software service. For more information on privacy, and terms of service, please refer to our dedicated sections on these topics.
sections.faq:
What is GPT-trainer?

GPT-trainer is a powerful no-code/low-code framework that lets you build advanced AI chatbots trained on your own data. It is simple to set up but also versatile. You have countless customization options and can integrate your chatbot with many popular platforms like WhatsApp, FB Messenger, Instagram, Zapier, Make.com, Shopify, Zendesk, etc.

With GPT-trainer, you can upload various types of documents such as PDFs, Word files, and simple Excel tables. You can also specify static websites to scrape content from directly. This allows you to leverage your own data to create hyper-personalized conversational interactions.

One of the unique features of GPT-trainer is its support for function-calling capabilities, which means you can integrate it with custom business logic to enable advanced workflow automations. If you need assistance with custom integrations, you can reach out to our support team directly hello\@gpt-trainer.com.com and we’d be happy to help.

Another key differentiator of GPT-trainer is its multi-agent approach to AI architecture. Rather than rely on a single fixed Large Language Model (LLM) for generative capabilities, GPT-trainer uses a combination of different LLMs and advanced routing/chaining techniques to produce the best responses or sequence of actions. Human agents can also be seamlessly integrated into this AI-supervised multi-agent orchestration.

Is it free to use?

Yes, GPT-trainer offers a free plan. You can register for an account by clicking “Try for free” found on the top right of the navigation bar on our website. If you find the tool useful and want additional features, you can upgrade to a paid plan. For detailed pricing information, you can visit our pricing page at: https://gpt-trainer.com/pricing.

Where can I find my Chatbot UUID?

To locate your Chatbot UUID for embedding onto your WordPress website, enter the Chatbot Dashboard tab, where you will find information regarding your chatbot.

What types of data can I use to train my AI chatbot?

We support most text document formats (.pdf, .docx, .txt, .md, .tex). We also support common images and YouTube videos. You can also provide an URL for automatic scraping of text content or input your own text directly.

Is any coding knowledge required to use GPT-Trainer and embed the chatbot onto my website?

Not at all! GPT-Trainer is designed to be a no-code solution. You can train and customize your chatbot without any coding knowledge, and the WordPress plugin simplifies the embedding process, making it accessible to users without technical expertise.

Can I customize the appearance and behavior of the chatbot on my WordPress site?

Absolutely! With GPT-Trainer, you have full control over customizing the chatbot’s appearance and behavior to perfectly align with your website. In the GPT-trainer app, go to “AI Agents” tab. You can configure your AI to suit your needs, such as specifying the language model, rate limit, temperature, and natural language instructions.

Additionally, in the “Settings / Appearance” tab, you can customize the initial messages, auto-response, theme, chat bubble icon and color, horizontal alignment, and much more.

Can I contact you if I have additional questions?

If you have any questions or encounter any issues, feel free to reach out to our support team hello\@gpt-trainer.com.com for assistance. We typically respond immediately, or within 12 hours if we are sleeping.
